thread.title: Headteacher fears for the safety of pupils at crossing | Anglia
thread.title_full: Headteacher fears for the safety of pupils at crossing | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Headteacher fears for the safety of pupils at crossing | Anglia
text:
Play video A video report by Stuart Leithes
The headteacher of a primary school in Cambridgeshire says she fears for the safety of pupils who have to cross a busy road each day.
There hasn't been a crossing patrol person at the site in Bassingbourn near Royston since the last one retired in 2014. They've not been able to recruit a replacement - but parents and children still cross there.
Last updated Tue 7 Feb 2017 Cambridgeshire
